title: Gluten-Free Cheesecake Cupcakes
instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C) and coat a muffin tin with cooking spray. 2. Combine gluten-free flour blend, chopped pecans, melted unsalted butter, and brown sugar in a bowl until it has a sandy texture. 3. Drop a heaping tablespoon of this mixture into the bottom of each muffin cup and press to create a flat crust. 4. Bake in the preheated oven until crusts are dry (about 12 minutes) and then set aside. Reduce oven temperature to 300째F (150째C). 5. Beat the cream cheese in a large bowl on low speed until creamy. 6. Add white sugar and salt, beating well. 7. Beat in eggs, one at a time, until smooth. 8. Beat in vanilla extract and lemon extract. 9. Evenly divide and pour the cream cheese mixture over the crusts. 10. Bake the cheesecakes for about 20 minutes until set. 11. Let cool completely for about 20 minutes, then cover and refrigerate until firm (at least 2 hours).
